verses.name: Matthew 2:8
verses.text: And he sent them to Bethlehem, and said, Go and search diligently for the young child; and when ye have found him, bring me word again, that I may come and worship him also.

verses.name: Matthew 2:9
verses.text: When they had heard the king, they departed; and, lo, the star, which they saw in the east, went before them, till it came and stood over where the young child was.

verses.name: Matthew 2:10
verses.text: When they saw the star, they rejoiced with exceeding great joy.
